data.name: Title
data.value: Code Evolution ðŸ§¬

data.name: ClubName
data.value: Code Evolution

data.name: ClubDescription
data.value: is a private club for developers who want to enhance their knowledge in AI and related topics, as well as increase productivity through the use of AI tools.

data.name: ClubTheses
data.value: The club is built around several theses:

data.name: Thesis1
data.value: AI will not replace developers

data.name: Thesis2
data.value: Developers using AI will replace developers ignoring AI

data.name: Thesis3
data.value: AI improves productivity

data.name: Thesis4
data.value: Understanding AI-based technologies is becoming a necessary minimum in development

data.name: ClubGoalLabel
data.value: Club goal

data.name: ClubGoal
data.value: â€” to increase the productivity and demand for club members through the study of AI tools and their application in work.

data.name: ClubMissionLabel
data.value: Club mission

data.name: ClubMission
data.value: â€” creating a community of developers who are well-versed in the rapidly developing world of neural networks and AI.

data.name: BenefitsTitle
data.value: What does the club offer?

data.name: BenefitsDescription
data.value: By joining Code Evolution, you'll be able to gain knowledge about using AI tools in programming, learn current news from the AI and development sphere, get access to exclusive content and a community of like-minded individuals, all in one place without getting distracted.

data.name: BenefitsListLabel
data.value: More specifically, you'll get:

data.name: Benefit1
data.value: Access to a community of 150+ engineers passionate about AI. New contacts and opportunities for development and collaboration.

data.name: Benefit2
data.value: Exclusive club content, which includes lectures, workshops, interviews, reports, reviews and calls (total of 60+ hours of video material).

data.name: Benefit3
data.value: Links to 130+ tools for programming with AI and 40+ news resources + recommendations for their use.

data.name: Benefit4
data.value: Weekly news digests with the most current news from the world of AI and development (audio and text formats).

data.name: Benefit5
data.value: The opportunity to get answers to your questions from experts, as well as share your knowledge and experience with like-minded individuals.

data.name: HowItWorksTitle
data.value: How the club works

data.name: HowItWorksDescription1
data.value: Code Evolution is a private group on Telegram, which consists of thematic chats.

data.name: HowItWorksDescription2
data.value: All club content and activities are concentrated in these chats, and sometimes even go beyond the online group: public content, offline meetups, etc.

data.name: HowItWorksDescription3
data.value: By subscribing to Code Evolution, you get access to the group and all the content contained in it, as well as direct communication with club members.

data.name: OpenResourcesLabel
data.value: In addition, we have several open resources that you can check out right now:

data.name: YouTubeChannel
data.value: YouTube channel

data.name: YouTubeChannelDescription
data.value: content examples, shorts.

data.name: GitHubRepositoryLabel
data.value: Open

data.name: GitHubRepository
data.value: GitHub repository

data.name: GitHubRepositoryDescription
data.value: with use cases from the club.

data.name: HowToGetInTitle
data.value: How to join the club?

data.name: SubscriptionLabel
data.value: Through subscription

data.name: SubscriptionDescription
data.value: You can get access to the club through monthly and annual subscriptions.

data.name: BuyMonthlySubscription
data.value: Buy monthly subscription (8 EUR)

data.name: BuyAnnualSubscription
data.value: Buy annual subscription (80 EUR)

data.name: PaymentOptions
data.value: You can pay for club membership using any bank card, or with crypto (USDT).

data.name: PaymentService
data.value: The Tribute service and their official Telegram bot are used for payment processing.

data.name: CommunityActivitiesLabel
data.value: Through community activities

data.name: CommunityActivitiesDescription
data.value: Moreover, if you actively promote AI tools, neural networks, ML, DS, LLM to a wide audience, are a community builder on these topics, an AI startup founder, or an owner of a popular GitHub repository, then welcome to the club without a subscription! Write to me on Telegram @iamitbeard

data.name: ContentExamplesTitle
data.value: Examples of club content

data.name: WorkshopTitle
data.value: Workshop on working with LangChain, LangSmith and LangGraph

data.name: InterviewTitle
data.value: Interview with Valery Selitsky - about AI and graphics

data.name: SituationalAwarenessTitle
data.value: SITUATIONAL AWARENESS / Part One - From GPT-4 to AGI / Club Call

data.name: DigestExampleTitle
data.value: Example of club AI digest

data.name: ForCompaniesTitle
data.value: For companies

data.name: ForCompaniesDescription
data.value: offers a unique opportunity for companies that want to enhance their developers' competencies in working with AI.

data.name: ForCompaniesBenefitsLabel
data.value: By purchasing a club subscription, your developers receive:

data.name: ForCompaniesBenefit1
data.value: Access to current knowledge and tools that increase development productivity.

data.name: ForCompaniesBenefit2
data.value: The ability to stay informed about the latest trends in AI and development.

data.name: ForCompaniesBenefit3
data.value: Competitive advantage in the IT services market, which will allow you to attract new clients.

data.name: ForCompaniesBenefit4
data.value: Increased loyalty to your company, which will help retain qualified employees and attract new ones.

data.name: ForCompaniesContactLabel
data.value: If you want to learn more about corporate subscriptions or discuss individual terms, please contact me:

data.name: SubscriptionAgreement
data.value: By purchasing a subscription, you agree to our club's rules.
